title: Got hacked and permanently banned, Anything i can do?
body:
I haven't played in a few months and come back today, update the client then go to log in but says I'm permanently banned, so i go to my email to see the email riot has sent me to see what i can do, but didn't get anything.

Go to league of legends website log into my account and go to my settings and notice my email has been changed to ******82853@163.com and I'm unable to change it at all cause i need to follow a link in that email.

They didn't change my password only my email

Is there anything that i can do other then summit a ticket?

I have spent so much money on this account and i really don't want to lose it.

replies.body:
Um I have a similar issue and now I'm certain my/this account has been compromised. I haven't played in about a month but I just received an email saying I have been permanently banned. So I fired up LoL, patched, and tried to log in. Sure enough, banned. Then I log into the forums here and see my summoner icon is changed. someone stole this account and used some "3rd party program". 

this is fucked. I'm going to try and contact support. maybe they can look at the IPs that have logged in or something.

Just read there's no way to appeal. This is complete bullshit. Can someone please check the logs as to who accessed my account? Or refund me for all the RP I purchased? I legitimately did not use any 3rd party program nor have I played recently. Just check around the time my summoner Icon was changed. Last one I was using when I played was the One For All icon with like 3 ziggs. I've changed my password. Hopefully I get a response. But knowing Riot, even if I do get a response it will be yet more bs.

I went ahead and looked into your account for you, and yea I can see where it looks like you might have been hacked. Anytime you have issued with being hacked or need any help with account recovery, you should definitely reach out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) asap. 

Once they can verify you as the account creator, they'll be able to help you get control of it and reverse any damage that was caused!
That's highly unfair. i had an account get hacked, confirmed I was an owner and still permabanned. i was even verified as account owner? how about I get my account unbanned too?

I double checked for you, but it doesn't look like this account has ever sent any tickets. If you were hacked and had punishments happen during the time that your account was compromised, reach back out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we should be able to look into that again!

yeah it's a different account. hopefully it will get unbanned -.-
Thank you so much, everything is fixed up now.

Same to me
I just played half day ago!!!
My account got changed into ***@163.com few hours ago.
And My account is now suspended. I dont think i will be able to gather up and play League from 0 again.
I really want some help. And I am too afraid to sign out
